definitions.definition: A portable platform , usually designed to be easily moved by a forklift , on which goods can be stacked, for transport or storage.

secondary_definitions: A portable platform , usually designed to be easily moved by a forklift , on which goods can be stacked, for transport or storage.

definitions.definition: ( heraldry ) A narrow vertical stripe, narrower than a pale . Diminutive of pale .

main_definition: ( heraldry ) A narrow vertical stripe, narrower than a pale . Diminutive of pale .

definitions.definition: A wooden implement, often oval or round, used by potters , crucible makers, etc., for forming, beating, and rounding their works.
( gilding ) An instrument used to take up gold leaf from the pillow , and to apply it.
( gilding ) A tool for gilding the backs of books over the bands.
( brickmaking ) A board on which a newly moulded brick is conveyed to the hack .
( engineering ) A click or pawl for driving a ratchet wheel.
( engineering ) One of the series of disks or pistons in the chain pump.
( horology ) One of the pieces or levers connected with the pendulum of a clock, or the balance of a watch, which receive the immediate impulse of the scape-wheel, or balance wheel.
( music ) In the organ, a valve between the wind chest and the mouth of a pipe or row of pipes.
( zoology ) One of a pair of shelly plates that protect the siphon tubes of certain bivalves, such as the Teredo .

secondary_definitions: A wooden implement, often oval or round, used by potters , crucible makers, etc., for forming, beating, and rounding their works.
( gilding ) An instrument used to take up gold leaf from the pillow , and to apply it.
( gilding ) A tool for gilding the backs of books over the bands.
( brickmaking ) A board on which a newly moulded brick is conveyed to the hack .
( engineering ) A click or pawl for driving a ratchet wheel.
( engineering ) One of the series of disks or pistons in the chain pump.
( horology ) One of the pieces or levers connected with the pendulum of a clock, or the balance of a watch, which receive the immediate impulse of the scape-wheel, or balance wheel.
( music ) In the organ, a valve between the wind chest and the mouth of a pipe or row of pipes.
( zoology ) One of a pair of shelly plates that protect the siphon tubes of certain bivalves, such as the Teredo .

definitions.definition: A Parisian measure of blood let; a cup containing three ounces, formerly used by surgeons.

main_definition: ( Can we verify this sense?) ( historical , rare ) A Parisian measure of blood let; a cup containing three ounces, formerly used by surgeons.
